document.full_text: japan should not expect a repeat of the chernobyl nuclear disaster after an explosion blew the roof off one of its nuclear power plants that had been shaken in a huge earthquake, experts said on saturday.
document.title: no repeat of chernobyl disaster for japan: experts
lines_and_colors: japan should not expect a repeat of the chernobyl nuclear disaster after an explosion blew the roof off one of its nuclear power plants that had been shaken in a huge earthquake, experts said on saturday.
